DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Fish oil ( Omega-3 Fatty Acid ) supplementation impact inflammation lean body mass old adult . The investigator expect Fish oil supplementation reduce inflammation prevent loss lean mass compare placebo .
DOC.criteria: 60 year age Fish , seafood allergy , nut allergy , soy allergy Habitual ( > 1/week ) fish seafood consumption Current Omega3 supplement use Gastrointestinal problem Current antiinflammatory medication use Current anticoagulant medication use
